item.title: California Fires Put Pressure on the US to Improve Environmental Policies
item.author: Leah Denoun,
item.description: For the past week, statewide wildfires in California have been blazing, having turned to ashes more than 80 000 acres, most in the counties of Sonoma and LA. The biggest fire is the Kincade Fire in the North of California. As of now, the fire is only 15% contained and has burned at least 74 000 â€¦
